scripts.build:netlify: rm -rf netlify && mkdir -p netlify/edge-functions netlify/functions && cd api && find . -type f ! -name 'wallpaper.js' ! -name 'rss.js' -exec cp {} ../netlify/edge-functions/ \; && cp rss.js ../netlify/functions/
scripts.env:vercel: cat .env.local | grep -v '^#' | while IFS='=' read -r key value; do if [[ $key =~ ^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$ ]]; then vercel env add "$key" production <<< "$value"; fi; done
scripts.env:netlify: cat .env.local | grep -v '^#' | while IFS= read -r line; do if [ -n "$line" ]; then netlify env:set "${line%%=*}" "${line#*=}"; fi; done
scripts.env:cf: cat .env.local | grep -v '^#' | while IFS='=' read -r key value; do wrangler secret put "$key" <<< "${value//\"/}"; done
